amendment.description: An amendment to reduce each funding item in the bill by 1.9 percent. The amendment would reduce the total funds appropriated in the bill by approximately $213 million.

action.text: Gutknecht amendment (A017) modified by unanimous consent. The amendment was modified to specify that the across-the-board funding reductions would apply only to funds appropriated for FY 1997.
On agreeing to the Gutknecht amendment (A017) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 268 (Roll no. 322).
